mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.DelegateIdException
mdException.label: Delegate Id Exception
mdException.description: The Operator Id cannot match the Spray Leader Id

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.UniqueOperatorIdException
mdException.label: Operator Id Exception
mdException.description: The Operator Id is already used

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.UniqueLeaderIdException
mdException.label: Leader Id Exception
mdException.description: The Spray Leader Id is already used

mdMethod.name: getAsViews
mdMethod.label: Get As Views
mdMethod.description: Returns GeoEntities as a list of GeoEntities as GeoEntityViews

mdParameter.name: entities
mdParameter.label: Entities
mdParameter.description: Ids of the GeoEntities to fetch

mdMethod.name: loadDefaultSearch
mdMethod.label: Load Default Search
mdMethod.description: Loads the default search for the current user

mdMethod.name: loadSearch
mdMethod.label: Load Search
mdMethod.description: Loads a search with the given id.
